attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY AWFUL

attributes.title: this app cut off my right hand
attributes.review:
It is a dark time for the Rebellion. Although the Death Star has been destroyed, Imperial troops have driven the Rebel forces from their hidden base and pursued them across the galaxy.

Evading the dreaded Imperial Starfleet, a group of freedom fighters led by Luke Skywalker has established a new secret base on the remote ice world of Hoth.

The evil lord Darth Vader, obsessed with finding young Skywalker, has dispatched thousands of remote probes into the far reaches of space‚Ä¶.

attributes.title: Disgusting
attributes.review: Downloaded the app and it immediately scanned my face and declared me Mexican, which I am, however it locked me out of the app and threatened me with a wall. I tried to delete and re download, this time with my white friend and it let her use it!!!!üò° This need to be fixed immediately I do not want to have to depend on my friend to use this horrible disgusting trash of an app.

attributes.title: Awful and full of fake news, racist comments, and untrue statements
attributes.review: Wow. I downloaded this app in hopes of learning about Trumps platform and his views, but it‚Äôs all lies, I‚Äôve looked up the facts and articles in the app and everywhere else I look they say it‚Äôs false. Donald Trump is also very racist, sexist, and narcissistic. If you are going to get this app, get it only to give it a bad rating and then delete the app.

attributes.title: worst app!!
attributes.review: Right after I downloaded this app my mom texted me saying our grandma was in the hospital in critical condition. A few days later I deleted this app and my grandma made a full recovery. I decided to download it again and my dog passed out right in front of me and died a few hours later. Every time I download the app something awful happens. Do not recommend.

attributes.title: false advertising
attributes.review: when I first downloaded this app I thought I was going to get great unbiased informative information on Donald Trump but instead I got cynical remarks about other candidates and their political stand and overall the agendas pushed were just not fair and obviously for his cult followers to trash other candidates but not hold there own accountable for the things he has done
